member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_SET
member.summary: The HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_SET structure is used to set the HTTP Server API wide timeout value.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_SET.KeyDesc
member.summary: A member of the enumeration identifying the timer that is set.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_SET.ParamDesc
member.summary: The value, in seconds, for the timer. The value must be greater than zero.
